thread.title: Introducing the New IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set from Snow Peak
thread.title_full: Introducing the New IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set from Snow Peak

author: Magnetic
title: Introducing the New IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set from Snow Peak
text:
Table of Contents
The camping experience is getting a serious upgrade with Snow Peak’s latest release: the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set. This new addition to the Iron Grill Table (IGT) System is designed for those who love to cook, prep, and dine in comfort while enjoying the outdoors. Whether you’re an experienced camper or just starting out, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set offers a versatile, accessible setup that’s as practical as it is stylish.
Why Choose the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set?
The IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is crafted with functionality and accessibility in mind, making it a go-to option for campers who want to take their culinary adventures outdoors without compromising on comfort. With an MSRP of $449.95, this new 3-unit set is a standout for several reasons:
- Low Height for Comfort: Unlike traditional
campingkitchen setups, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is designed to be accessible from the comfort of your camp chair. The lower height allows users to cook, chop, and access stored items without the strain of standing for long periods—a feature that’s especially beneficial for those who prioritize a relaxed and enjoyable camp experience. - Versatile Cooking Space: This 3-unit system comes with all the essentials: a Deep Mesh Tray for storing kitchen tools or dry goods, a Chopping Board Set L for food prep, a Flat Burner for cooking, and a convenient IGT Three Unit Carry Case for easy transportation. Whether you’re boiling, frying, or chopping ingredients for a gourmet meal, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set provides enough space to handle it all seamlessly.
- Integrated System: As part of
Snow Peak’sIron Grill Table System, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is fully compatible with other IGT components, making it a flexible solution that can be expanded and customized to suit your specific needs. It’s the perfect addition for those who want to elevate their outdoor cooking setup.
Designed to be accessible from the comfort of your camp chair, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set includes components for cooking, prepping, cleaning, and storage. The set features the IGT 3 Unit Low Set as the foundation, Deep Mesh Tray 1 Unit for storage of kitchen tools or dry goods, Chopping Board Set L for food prep, Flat Burner for cooking, and the IGT Three Unit Carry Case for easy transportation.
What’s Included in the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set?
The IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set includes several components that make outdoor cooking and prep more accessible and enjoyable:
- IGT 3 Unit Low Set: The foundation of the system, providing ample space for cooking and preparation.
- Deep Mesh Tray 1 Unit: Ideal for storing utensils, dry goods, or other kitchen tools, ensuring you have everything within reach.
- Chopping Board Set L: A large chopping board that also includes a knife slot for safe storage, making food prep straightforward.
- Flat Burner: A single burner stove that delivers consistent heat, perfect for cooking a variety of meals.
- IGT Three Unit Carry Case: Keeps all components organized and ready to go for your next
camping adventure.
Benefits of the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set
Snow Peak’s reputation for high-quality outdoor gear is well-known, and the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set continues that legacy by bringing together form and function in one cohesive package. Here’s why this set should be on every camper’s radar:
- Compact and Portable: Weighing in at just enough to be easily manageable, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is compact yet spacious. It’s simple to pack, set up, and transport, making it ideal for road trips, hiking adventures, or family camping outings.
- Durable and Reliable: Made with high-grade materials, this set can withstand the rigors of the outdoors. Whether you’re camping in rugged terrain or setting up in a more relaxed environment, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is built to last.
- Enhances the Camping Experience: With its accessible design, this set makes the camp kitchen experience enjoyable for everyone, from the seasoned camp chef to the casual camper looking to prepare a quick meal. It’s an excellent choice for small group camping trips where shared cooking responsibilities are a must.
Frequently Asked Questions
1. Is the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set compatible with other Snow Peak IGT components?
Yes, the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is part of the Snow Peak Iron Grill Table System, which means it can be integrated with other IGT components to create a customized kitchen setup that fits your needs.
2. What is the height of the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set?
The IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set is specifically designed to be lower than traditional camping kitchen setups, making it accessible from the comfort of a camp chair. This setup ensures a more relaxed cooking experience.
3. Can I add more components to the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set?
Absolutely! The IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set serves as a base that can be expanded with additional IGT units, such as additional burners, prep tables, or storage options, to suit your specific requirements.
4. How easy is it to transport the IGT Camp Kitchen Low Set?
The included IGT Three Unit Carry Case makes it easy to pack and transport the entire set. Each component is designed to fit neatly into the case, ensuring that setting up or breaking down your camp kitchen is a breeze.
5. What types of cooking can I do with the Flat Burner?
The Flat Burner is versatile enough for various types of cooking, from boiling water for coffee in the morning to frying up vegetables or simmering a stew. Its consistent heat output makes it a reliable choice for most campfire culinary tasks.
Magnetic
Hello from the Magnetic editorial desk.
